text.content: And now that it's all over  The birds can nest again  I'll only snow when the sun comes out  I'll shine only when it starts to rain    And if you want a drink  Just squeeze my hand  And wine will flow into the land  And feed my lambs    For I am a mirror  I can reflect the moon  I will write songs for you  I'll be your silver spoon    I'm sorry I took your time  I am the poem that doesn't rhyme  Just turn back a page  I'll waste away, I'll waste away  I'll waste away, I'll waste away  I'll waste away, I'll waste away
